I forgot this doesn't work on Windows...

```js
node --eval "fs.writeFileSync('.husky/pre-commit','npx lint-staged\n')"
```

See https://github.com/prettier/prettier/blob/c8ba8dbca18858a7962184bbb3898502b9ec7cfb/docs/install.md?plain=1#L31-L40
